author: eth2_gitter_bot
content: <dangerousfood> In the `beacon-chain-validator` spec there is a method `get_eth1_data(distance: uint64) -> Eth1Data`. The value `distance` is described as `relative to the Eth 1.0 head at the start of the current Eth 1.0 voting period`. Is the block number of the Eth1Data being returned equal to `best block - distance`?

author: paulhauner
content:
@dangerousfood, this is my interpretation


https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/issues/1439
